summary: Hours of fiddling around in BodySlide resulted in a preset adjusted to my liking, and dare I say, maybe to your liking also!
descriptionHtml:
[center] [img]http://puu.sh/9SjRZ/43bfc8400b.png[/img][/center]
UPDATES!
[list]
[*] Thread style revamped
[*] Updated installation tutorial to work with BodySlide2 Outfit Studio
[*] Added .NMM installer button
[*] Added screenshots
[*] Added 6 animated gifs
[*] Added 2 new styles (all part of v5)
- Balanced Variations (min weight barely differs from max weight)
- Medium Variations (min weight clearly differs from max weight)
[*] .NMM installer version will extract both styles to your BodySlide/Sliderpresets folder; pick the one you like (I personally prefer the balanced version, all screenshots are taken with it; less time went into the creation of the medium variation version, but I'll still keep it up for those who want to try it out)
[/list]
[center][img]http://puu.sh/9Spvp/acaba27ffb.png[/img]
[heading][b]I. ABOUT[/b][/heading][/center]
Hours of fiddling around in BodySlide resulted in a preset adjusted to my liking, and dare I say, maybe to your liking also!
It started off over an year ago, when I tried BodySlide for the first time. Needless to say, my tastes on the *cough* models have grown better with time, as my *cough* experience with, uh, female bodies also increased. I really shouldn't be saying any of this.
[center][img]http://puu.sh/9Spvp/acaba27ffb.png[/img]
[heading][b]II. REQUIRED MODS[/b][/heading][/center]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2666//?]Caliente's Female Body Mod Big Bottom Edition -CBBE-[/url] - Required for the main CBBE model
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/32731/?]BodySlide2 Outfit Studio[/url] - Required for applying the preset
[center][img]http://puu.sh/9Spvp/acaba27ffb.png[/img]
[heading][b]III. INSTALLATION - Tweaked for BodySlide2 Outfit Studio[/b][/heading][/center]
[list=1]
[*] Open the archive you chose to download from the Files tab
[*] Extract the .xml file directly to your [b]Data/CalienteTools/BodySlide/SliderPresets/[/b] folder
[*] Run BodySlideWXP.exe
[*] On the top part you should see 3 main tags: "Outfit/Body", "Preset" and "Save Preset"
[*] Collapse the "Outfit/Body" list and select "CalienteBodyAdvanced"
[*] Collapse the "Preset" list and select any of the presets you downloaded (the name will always start with Starcrows)
[*] Click "Create Bodies"
[*] If you'd like to associate this preset with armor sets that support BodySlide, then click "Batch Build"
Currently, my preset is associated with [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/12273/?]Caliente's Vanilla Outfits for CBBE[/url] and ChronoTrigger77's [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/25259//?]Remodeled Armor for CBBE Bodyslide and BBP[/url]
[*] BodySlide should now pop up with the message "Save Succesful"
[*] Close BodySlideWXP and run Skyrim. Enjoy!
[/list]
[center][img]http://puu.sh/9Spvp/acaba27ffb.png[/img]
[heading][b]IV. RECOMMENDED MODS[/b][/heading][/center]
[list]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/25259//?]Remodeled Armor for CBBE Bodyslide and BBP[/url] - Intentionally skimpy, sexy-looking armors
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/27352/?]Body Options[/url] - Top notch body customization
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35267/?]SG Female Textures Renewal[/url] - Personal preference, but out of all the female body textures, I seem to like this one the most
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/22701//?]Seductive Lips HD[/url] - Blow a kiss
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/30411//?]BROWS[/url] - Eyebrows at their finest
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/13722//?]The Eyes Of Beauty[/url] - Pretty self-explanatory
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/29624//?]RaceMenu[/url] - Provides an insane amount of sliders to play around with
[/list][list]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/20781/?]Project ENB[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/50065/?]Natural Lighting and Atmospherics for ENB [/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/37202/?]Unreal Cinema ENB[/url]
[/list]
[center][img]http://puu.sh/9Spvp/acaba27ffb.png[/img]
[heading][b]V. TROUBLESHOOT / FAQ[/b][/heading][/center]
Q: [color=#a97a3d]I get the message "Blender - Failed to Save File"[/color]
A: I can only think of one reason why this message would pop up, and that is: your Skyrim is installed in a different path than steamapps, or most likely BodySlide's config.xml can't reach your Registry (regedit) to gather the needed information about Skyrim's Data folder.
Right? Good. Let's get going...
1. Go to CalienteTools/BodySlide/ and look for an .XML document called "Config.xml"
2. Download [url=http://notepad-plus-plus.org/]NotePad++[/url] and use it to open "Config.xml"
3. Identify these two lines shown in green:
[color=green]<!-- <GameDataPath> D:/steam/steamapps/common/skyrim/Data/ </GameDataPath>[/color]
and
[color=green]<!-- <TexOutputPath> C:/steam/steamapps/common/skyrim/Data/ </TexOutputPath>[/color]
Now, manually change the path in both lines to where your Skyrim Data Folder is located
4. Remove "<!--" symbols in front of both lines (it should change color to blue and black)
5. Save and exit

Q: [color=#a97a3d]Whenever I generate a body in BodySlideWXP, it has a weird "no image" pattern to it![/color]
A: That has come to my attention as well. See above fix.
[center][img]http://puu.sh/9Spvp/acaba27ffb.png[/img]
[heading][b]VI. CREDITS[/b][/heading][/center]
[list]
[*] Caliente
[*] Ousnius
[*] SvarogNL
[*] EchtelionOtw
[*] Gabriel Mailhot
[*] ChronoTrigger77
[*] Expired
[*] Hello Santa
[*] Hvergelmir
[*] Confidence-Man
[*] Unreal Warfare
[*] Bronze316[/list][line]
Font used: [url=http://www.dafont.com/our-lil-secret-forever.font]Our lil secret forever[/url]
Thank you for downloading this preset! I'd be more than glad to see you submit your ingame screenshots! :)
[center][img]http://puu.sh/9UMhy/97d0935ef7.png[/img][/center]
[center][img]http://puu.sh/9Sx5P/8fd115bf4e.png[/img][/center]
